From MetaCoq Require Import utils Ast AstUtils Environment Induction LiftSubst.

Universe substitution

Substitution of universe levels for universe level variables, used to implement universe polymorphism. 
A:Type
ua:UnivSubst A
u:Instance.t
x:context_decl
xs:list context_decl
subst_instance u (x :: xs) =
subst_instance u x :: subst_instance u xs


A:Type
ua:UnivSubst A
u:Instance.t
x:context_decl
xs:list context_decl
subst_instance u (x :: xs) =
subst_instance u x :: subst_instance u xs
 reflexivity. Qed.


u:Instance.t
c:term
n, k:nat
lift n k (subst_instance u c) =
subst_instance u (lift n k c)


u:Instance.t
c:term
n, k:nat
lift n k (subst_instance u c) =
subst_instance u (lift n k c)

  
u:Instance.t
c:term
n, k:nat
lift n k (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (lift n k c)

  induction c in k |- * using term_forall_list_ind; simpl; auto;
    rewrite ?map_map_compose, ?compose_on_snd, ?compose_map_def, ?map_length,
            ?map_predicate_map_predicate, ?map_predicate_subst_instance_predicate, 
            ?map_branch_map_branch;
    f_equal; eauto; solve_all; eauto.
Qed.


u:Instance.t
f:term
a:list term
subst_instance u (mkApps f a) =
mkApps (subst_instance u f) (map (subst_instance u) a)


u:Instance.t
f:term
a:list term
subst_instance u (mkApps f a) =
mkApps (subst_instance u f) (map (subst_instance u) a)

  
u:Instance.t
f:term
a:list term
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f a) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f)
  (map (subst_instance_constr u) a)

  
u:Instance.t
f, a:term
a0:list term
IHa:forall f0 : term,
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f0 a0) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f0) (map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f (a :: a0)) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f)
  (map (subst_instance_constr u) (a :: a0))

  
u:Instance.t
f, a:term
a0:list term
IHa:forall f0 : term,
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f0 a0) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f0) (map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f (a :: a0)) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f)
  (subst_instance_constr u a
   :: map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
 
u:Instance.t
f, a:term
a0:list term
IHa:forall f0 : term,
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f0 a0) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f0) (map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
subst_instance_constr u
  match f with
  | tApp f0 args => tApp f0 (args ++ a :: a0)
  | _ => tApp f (a :: a0)
  end =
match subst_instance_constr u f with
| tApp f0 args =>
    tApp f0
      (args ++
       subst_instance_constr u a
       :: map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
| _ =>
    tApp (subst_instance_constr u f)
      (subst_instance_constr u a
       :: map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
end
 
u:Instance.t
f:term
args:list term
a:term
a0:list term
IHa:forall f0 : term,
subst_instance_constr u (mkApps f0 a0) =
mkApps (subst_instance_constr u f0)
  (map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
subst_instance_constr u (tApp f (args ++ a :: a0)) =
match subst_instance_constr u (tApp f args) with
| tApp f0 args0 =>
    tApp f0
      (args0 ++
       subst_instance_constr u a
       :: map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
| _ =>
    tApp (subst_instance_constr u (tApp f args))
      (subst_instance_constr u a
       :: map (subst_instance_constr u) a0)
end

  simpl; now rewrite map_app.
Qed.


u:Instance.t
ctx:context
t:term
subst_instance u (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx t) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u ctx)
  (subst_instance u t)


u:Instance.t
ctx:context
t:term
subst_instance u (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx t) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u ctx)
  (subst_instance u t)

  
u:Instance.t
a:context_decl
ctx:list context_decl
t:term
IHctx:forall (u0 : Instance.t) (t0 : term),
subst_instance u0 (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx t0) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u0 ctx)
  (subst_instance u0 t0)
subst_instance u
  (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx (mkProd_or_LetIn a t)) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance_context u ctx)
  (mkProd_or_LetIn (map_decl (subst_instance u) a)
     (subst_instance u t))

  
u:Instance.t
a:context_decl
ctx:list context_decl
t:term
IHctx:forall (u0 : Instance.t) (t0 : term),
subst_instance u0 (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx t0) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u0 ctx)
  (subst_instance u0 t0)
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u ctx)
  (subst_instance u (mkProd_or_LetIn a t)) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance_context u ctx)
  (mkProd_or_LetIn (map_decl (subst_instance u) a)
     (subst_instance u t))
 
u:Instance.t
a:context_decl
ctx:list context_decl
t:term
IHctx:forall (u0 : Instance.t) (t0 : term),
subst_instance u0 (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx t0) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u0 ctx)
  (subst_instance u0 t0)
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u ctx)
  (subst_instance u
     match decl_body a with
     | Some b =>
         tLetIn (decl_name a) b (decl_type a) t
     | None => tProd (decl_name a) (decl_type a) t
     end) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance_context u ctx)
  match
    option_map (subst_instance u) (decl_body a)
  with
  | Some b =>
      tLetIn (decl_name a) b
        (subst_instance u (decl_type a))
        (subst_instance u t)
  | None =>
      tProd (decl_name a)
        (subst_instance u (decl_type a))
        (subst_instance u t)
  end
 
u:Instance.t
a:context_decl
ctx:list context_decl
t:term
IHctx:forall (u0 : Instance.t) (t0 : term),
subst_instance u0 (it_mkProd_or_LetIn ctx t0) =
it_mkProd_or_LetIn (subst_instance u0 ctx)
  (subst_instance u0 t0)
subst_instance u
  match decl_body a with
  | Some b => tLetIn (decl_name a) b (decl_type a) t
  | None => tProd (decl_name a) (decl_type a) t
  end =
match option_map (subst_instance u) (decl_body a) with
| Some b =>
    tLetIn (decl_name a) b
      (subst_instance u (decl_type a))
      (subst_instance u t)
| None =>
    tProd (decl_name a)
      (subst_instance u (decl_type a))
      (subst_instance u t)
end

  destruct (decl_body a); eauto.
Qed.


u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
#|subst_instance u ctx| = #|ctx|


u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
#|subst_instance u ctx| = #|ctx|

  
u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
#|map (map_decl (subst_instance u)) ctx| = #|ctx|

  now rewrite map_length.
Qed.


u:Instance.t
c:term
N:list term
k:nat
subst (map (subst_instance u) N) k
  (subst_instance u c) =
subst_instance u (subst N k c)


u:Instance.t
c:term
N:list term
k:nat
subst (map (subst_instance u) N) k
  (subst_instance u c) =
subst_instance u (subst N k c)

  
u:Instance.t
c:term
N:list term
k:nat
subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
  (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (subst N k c)

  
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
(if k <=? n
 then
  match
    nth_error (map (subst_instance_constr u) N)
      (n - k)
  with
  | Some b => lift0 k b
  | None => tRel (n - #|N|)
  end
 else tRel n) =
subst_instance_constr u
  (if k <=? n
   then
    match nth_error N (n - k) with
    | Some b => lift0 k b
    | None => tRel (n - #|N|)
    end
   else tRel n)
u:Instance.t
c:term
l, N:list term
k:nat
IHc:forall k0 : nat,
subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0 (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c)
H:Forall
  (fun c0 : term =>
   forall k0 : nat,
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0
     (subst_instance_constr u c0) =
   subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c0)) l
mkApps
  (subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
     (subst_instance_constr u c))
  (map
     (fun x : term =>
      subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
        (subst_instance_constr u x)) l) =
subst_instance_constr u
  (mkApps (subst N k c) (map (subst N k) l))


  
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
(if k <=? n
 then
  match
    nth_error (map (subst_instance_constr u) N)
      (n - k)
  with
  | Some b => lift0 k b
  | None => tRel (n - #|N|)
  end
 else tRel n) =
subst_instance_constr u
  (if k <=? n
   then
    match nth_error N (n - k) with
    | Some b => lift0 k b
    | None => tRel (n - #|N|)
    end
   else tRel n)
 
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
match
  nth_error (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) (n - k)
with
| Some b => lift0 k b
| None => tRel (n - #|N|)
end =
subst_instance_constr u
  match nth_error N (n - k) with
  | Some b => lift0 k b
  | None => tRel (n - #|N|)
  end
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
tRel n = subst_instance_constr u (tRel n)
 
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
match
  option_map (subst_instance_constr u)
    (nth_error N (n - k))
with
| Some b => lift0 k b
| None => tRel (n - #|N|)
end =
subst_instance_constr u
  match nth_error N (n - k) with
  | Some b => lift0 k b
  | None => tRel (n - #|N|)
  end
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
tRel n = subst_instance_constr u (tRel n)

    
u:Instance.t
n:nat

k:nat
t:term
match
  option_map (subst_instance_constr u) (Some t)
with
| Some b => lift0 k b
| None => tRel (n - #|N|)
end = subst_instance_constr u (lift0 k t)
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term
k:nat
match option_map (subst_instance_constr u) None with
| Some b => lift0 k b
| None => tRel (n - #|N|)
end = subst_instance_constr u (tRel (n - #|N|))
u:Instance.t
n:nat
N:list term

tRel n = subst_instance_constr u (tRel n)

| None => tRel (n - #|N|)
end = subst_instance_constr u (tRel (n - #|N|))
u:Instance.t

N:list term
k:nat

| None => tRel (n - #|N|)

k:nat

u:Instance.t

tRel n = subst_instance_constr u (tRel n)
 reflexivity.
    
  
u:Instance.t
c:term
l, N:list term
k:nat
IHc:forall k0 : nat,
subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0 (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c)
H:Forall
  (fun c0 : term =>
   forall k0 : nat,
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0
     (subst_instance_constr u c0) =
   subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c0)) l
mkApps
  (subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
     (subst_instance_constr u c))
  (map
     (fun x : term =>
      subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
        (subst_instance_constr u x)) l) =
subst_instance_constr u
  (mkApps (subst N k c) (map (subst N k) l))
 
u:Instance.t
c:term
l, N:list term
k:nat
IHc:forall k0 : nat,
subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0 (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c)
H:Forall
  (fun c0 : term =>
   forall k0 : nat,
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0
     (subst_instance_constr u c0) =
   subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c0)) l
mkApps
  (subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
     (subst_instance_constr u c))
  (map
     (fun x : term =>
      subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
        (subst_instance_constr u x)) l) =
mkApps (subst_instance u (subst N k c))
  (map (subst_instance u) (map (subst N k) l))
 
u:Instance.t
c:term
l, N:list term
k:nat
IHc:forall k0 : nat,
subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0 (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c)
H:Forall
  (fun c0 : term =>
   forall k0 : nat,
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0
     (subst_instance_constr u c0) =
   subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c0)) l
map
  (fun x : term =>
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
     (subst_instance_constr u x)) l =
map (subst_instance u) (map (subst N k) l)

    
u:Instance.t
c:term
l, N:list term
k:nat
IHc:forall k0 : nat,
subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0 (subst_instance_constr u c) =
subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c)
H:Forall
  (fun c0 : term =>
   forall k0 : nat,
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k0
     (subst_instance_constr u c0) =
   subst_instance_constr u (subst N k0 c0)) l
map
  (fun x : term =>
   subst (map (subst_instance_constr u) N) k
     (subst_instance_constr u x)) l =
map (fun x : term => subst_instance u (subst N k x)) l
 solve_all.
Qed.


u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
k:nat
map (subst_instance u) (to_extended_list_k ctx k) =
to_extended_list_k ctx k


u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
k:nat
map (subst_instance u) (to_extended_list_k ctx k) =
to_extended_list_k ctx k

  
u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
k:nat
H:Forall
  (fun x : term =>
   exists n : nat,
     x = tRel n /\ k <= n < k + #|ctx|)
  (to_extended_list_k ctx k)
map (subst_instance u) (to_extended_list_k ctx k) =
to_extended_list_k ctx k

  
u:Instance.t
ctx:list context_decl
k:nat
x:term
H:exists n : nat, x = tRel n /\ k <= n < k + #|ctx|
subst_instance u x = x
 now destruct H as [n [-> _]].
Qed.


u:Instance.t
t:term
closedu 0 t -> subst_instance u t = t


u:Instance.t
t:term
closedu 0 t -> subst_instance u t = t

  
u:Instance.t
t:term
closedu 0 t -> subst_instance_constr u t = t

  induction t in |- * using term_forall_list_ind; simpl; auto; intros H';
    rewrite -> ?map_map_compose, ?compose_on_snd, ?compose_map_def, ?map_length,
               ?map_predicate_map_predicate, ?map_branch_map_branch;
    try f_equal; eauto with substu; unfold test_def, test_predicate in *;
      try solve [f_equal; eauto; repeat (rtoProp; solve_all; eauto with substu)].
Qed.


u:Instance.t
Hcl:is_true (closedu_instance 0 u)
t:term
closedu #|u| t -> closedu 0 (subst_instance u t)


u:Instance.t
Hcl:is_true (closedu_instance 0 u)
t:term
closedu #|u| t -> closedu 0 (subst_instance u t)

  induction t in |- * using term_forall_list_ind; simpl; auto; intros H';
    rewrite -> ?map_map_compose, ?compose_on_snd, ?compose_map_def, ?map_length, ?forallb_map,
               ?map_predicate_map_predicate;
    try f_equal; auto with substu;
      unfold test_def, test_predicate in *; simpl;
      try solve [f_equal; eauto; repeat (rtoProp; solve_all); intuition auto with substu].
Qed.
